videoIdea: Show friend groups enjoying holiday drinks together with festive decorations in the background
description: Celebrate the joy of friendship this Christmas season with our special squad packages
label: Squad Christmas Special
caption:
🎄The Best Gift is Spending time together☕

Ipaparamdam namin ang timplang Pasko sa inyong squad! Halina't dumaan sa Kape Siglo at para magsaya, magtawanan, at higit sa lahat, Uminom ng masarap na kape habang nilalasap ang simoy ng Kapaskuhan —dahil ang Pasko ay mas masaya kapag magkakasama! ✨

videoIdea: Create an animated graphic showing holiday operating hours with festive coffee visuals
description: Inform customers about our special holiday operating hours with a cheerful visual announcement
label: Holiday Schedule
caption:
🎄 KAPE SIGLO HOLIDAY SCHEDULE ☕

📌 CLOSED:
• December 24–25 (Christmas Break)
• January 1 (New Year's Day)

📌 OPEN HOURS:
✅ Dec 26–27: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM
✅ Dec 28–30: 3:00 PM – 11:00 PM
✅ Dec 31: 1:00 PM – 9:00 PM
✅ Jan 2: 3:00 PM – 11:00 PM

Lasapain ang Pasko kasama ang pamilya at isang tasa ng paboritong kape. 🎄☕

videoIdea: Showcase the café's Christmas lights display with customers enjoying warm drinks
description: Celebrate the brightest nights of the year with our special holiday ambiance and drinks
label: Festive Lights Celebration
caption:
✨🎄 Ilaw ng Pasko sa Kape Siglo 🎄✨

Sama sama tayong magdiwang sa ilalim ng kumukutikutitap na ilaw at Damahin ang masarap na simoy ng paskuhan sa bawat tsaa ng Kape

Gawin makulay ang pasko kasama ng Kape Siglo simula sa maliliwag na ngiti at masarap na kase💡❤️

videoIdea: Show groups of three friends enjoying holiday drinks together with festive ambiance
description: Celebrate friendship trios with our special holiday drink packages for groups
label: Barkada Holiday Package
caption:
🎄☕ Tatluhan ang Saya: Paskong Trio para lang sa inyo! 🎅👯‍♂️👯

Pangtrio ba ang hanap nyo? Tumambay kasama ang iyong barkada, kapatid, o tropang tatluhan at damhin ang masayang Pasko over kape at kwentuhan!

Dahil walang makakatalo sa Trio na nakpapakita ng perfect balance katulad ng Kape at Panghimagas sa Kape Siglo

videoIdea: Suggest coffee drinks to accompany holiday feasts.
description: Help plan perfect holiday meals.
label: Noche Buena Pairing
caption:
🎄✨ Bisperas ng Pasko ☕🎅
Damhin ang diwa ng Pasko kasama ang kape Siglo ngayong Disyembre 23! Bago ang noche buena, Tumigil ka muna para maramdaman ang init ng kape at lamig ng simoy ng Pasko. Dahil kahit si Rudolph, humihinto muna para magkape. 😉

videoIdea: Quiet morning moments before holiday chaos.
description: Capture the calm before the celebration.
label: Christmas Eve
caption: One last quiet cup before the holiday magic begins. Merry Christmas Eve!

videoIdea: Show the café team in Christmas attire serving special holiday drinks with festive cheer
description: Share the warmth of Christmas through our special holiday coffee offerings
label: Christmas Day Special
caption:
🎄☕ Paskong masarap basta may regalong kapeng matatanggap🎁✨

Sama-sama tayong magdiwang sa pamamagitan ng masasarap na kape na punong-puno ng pagmamahalan. Dahil ang Pasko para samin ay pasko para sa pagsasama, kwentuhan, at kape na mula sa puso. ☕🌟

Merry Christmas Mula sa Kape Siglo!

videoIdea: Create a respectful tribute video featuring Rizal-inspired coffee art and historical snippets
description: Honor Dr. José Rizal's legacy through a special coffee tribute and historical reflection
label: Rizal Day Tribute
caption:
☕ Kape't Paggunita, Rizal Day sa aming Café 📖✨

Sabay nating alalahanin ang kabayanihan ni Dr. José Rizal. At magsilbing paalala ang araw na ito na ang bawat tagumpay ay nagsisimula sa maliliit na pagkilos at pagmamahal sa bayan. Dahil Katulad Ni José, Madaling magpursigi basta may kapeng katabi

videoIdea: Countdown to midnight with coffee toasts.
description: Celebrate the year's end with your community.
label: New Year's Eve
caption: Raising our cups to 2025—see you next year! 🎉☕
